Class InboxPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • CommandPresenter
      • InboxPresenter

  • public class InboxPresenter
extends CommandPresenter
    Contains the text display for viewing chat history and replying to messages.
    Author:
    Chrisee, Elliot

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InboxPresenter() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void chatView(Registrar reg, Chatroom c)
      Displays the chatlog, including message content, the sender name and username, and the date and time the message was sent, converted to local time.
      void menuDisplay(Registrar reg, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> friends)
      Displays a series of users with whom the logged in user has chatted.
      void messageFormatter(java.lang.String message)
      Formats the message such that: - It has at least 80 characters per line - If a line exceeds 80 characters, then the line would be wrapped at the first space after the 80th character
      void replyMessage()
      Displays text for when a user can reply to a message

        Displays a series of users with whom the logged in user has chatted.
        Parameters:

        friends - An ArrayList of friends; this user has chatted with these friends

      • chatView

        public void chatView(Registrar reg,

      • messageFormatter

        public void messageFormatter(java.lang.String message)
        Formats the message such that: - It has at least 80 characters per line - If a line exceeds 80 characters, then the line would be wrapped at the first space after the 80th character
        Parameters:
        message - String of message to be formatted

      • replyMessage

        public void replyMessage()
        Displays text for when a user can reply to a message
